displayProperties.description:
In Empire Hunts, defeat powerful combatants.

Unlocks access to higher difficulty Empire Hunts.
displayProperties.name: Europan Explorer II

267578801.displaySource: "Athrys was Eramis's mate. Their bond was strong. She valued Eramis's strength and stubbornness; Eramis admired her gentle nature." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Europan Explorer II

267578800.displaySource: "Eramis and Athrys had many hatchlings. For Eliksni, hatchlings are raised by a village. Cherished by all." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description:
Complete an Exo Challenge.

Awards pinnacle Europa gear.
displayProperties.name: Europan Explorer III

2859321092.displaySource: "Their children were being raised to follow Eramis; to keep watch over the movements of the Great Machine. But she wished for them to be like Athrys. Makers. Builders." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Europan Explorer III

2859321093.displaySource: "She did not want her children to always be worrying over the skies. She… ah. That is enough story for now, my friend. The memories are heavy. Perhaps… another time." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description:
Complete a Heroic public event in Eventide Ruins, Asterion Abyss, and Cadmus Ridge.

Unlocks ability to find Crystocrene armor from the first Heroic public event each day in the Europa Eclipsed Zone.
displayProperties.name: Europan Gear I

1987856996.displaySource: "Variks helped allies escape Eramis. Others, like Variks, who came to Europa for peace, not war." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Europan Gear I

1987856997.displaySource: "Eramis was a warrior. A leader of warriors. Not equipped for peace. She knew only war for too long." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description:
In Lost Sectors, defeat combatants with Kinetic, Energy, and Power weapons while wearing at least 4 pieces of Crystocrene armor.

Unlocks Europa weapon drops from the first Lost Sector completed each day in the Europa Eclipsed Zone.
displayProperties.name: Europan Gear II

2898442315.displaySource: "Variks believes Misraaks wishes for peace. But he is young. His house is small and younger still." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Europan Gear II

2898442314.displaySource: "Young though he is, Kell Misraaks represents hope to Eliksni. Hope of peace with Guardians, with humanity." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description:
In Empire Hunts, defeat Champions while wearing at least 4 pieces of Crystocrene armor.

Unlocks guaranteed high-stat Crystocrene armor drops from the first Empire Hunt each week (Heroic difficulty or higher).
displayProperties.name: Europan Gear III

2798544374.displaySource: "Time will tell if House Light will change the fate of my people. No longer Fallen. Eliksni once more." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Europan Gear III

2798544375.displaySource: "Variks and his allies will seek refuge on Earth. More Eliksni will flee House Salvation. Variks will wait. Patient." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description:
In the weekly Europa Eclipsed Zone, collect Glacial Starwort from resource nodes and chests.

Allows you to find more planetary materials in the Europa Eclipsed Zone.
displayProperties.name: Europa Rewards I

745565841.displaySource: "Europa is strange. Sometimes, at night, Variks hears noises that echo across the ice…" —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Europa Rewards I

745565840.displaySource: "What did you find out there, Guardian?" —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description:
In the weekly Europa Eclipsed Zone, complete patrols, Lost Sectors, and Heroic public events.

Unlocks chance to acquire more Herealways Pieces in the Europa Eclipsed Zone.
displayProperties.name: Europa Rewards II

595255798.displaySource: "Variks hears stories. Something old, very old, lurking below the ice…" —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Europa Rewards II

595255799.displaySource: "What does the Guardian know of Herealways? It is precious to us Eliksni. More precious even than Glimmer because it is rare…" —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description:
In Empire Hunts, defeat powerful combatants with finishers while wearing at least 4 pieces of Crystocrene armor.

Unlocks +1 energy capacity of all Crystocrene armor drops.
displayProperties.name: Europa Rewards III

695153739.displaySource: "Variks misses old Eliksni fashions. Varied. Colorful. Finely made…" —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Europa Rewards III

695153738.displaySource: "Guardians cherish their armor, yes? Variks will help improve it." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description:
Defeat Vex on Europa to collect detection technology.

Unlocks Europa Collectible Detector (Short-Range).
displayProperties.name: Collectible Detector I

1127960549.displaySource: "Many treasures on Europa. Useful to the Guardian, yes? Variks can help you find them." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Collectible Detector I

1127960548.displaySource: "Bring these parts to Charon's Crossing. Variks will make something useful." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description:
Defeat Vex on Europa with precision final blows to gather calibration data for your Collectible Detector.

Upgrades the range of your Europa Collectible Detector.
displayProperties.name: Collectible Detector II

2211737354.displaySource: "Variks does not understand why Eramis chose Europa. It is desolate. Unforgiving. Not at all like Riis." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Collectible Detector II

2211737355.displaySource: "Eramis saw Europa in a dream. A vision. She was lured, like all of us…" —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description:
Defeat Vex on Europa with Arc, Solar, and Void weapons.

Maximizes the range of your Europa Collectible Detector.
displayProperties.name: Collectible Detector III

3817061967.displaySource: "Variks had hopes for Europa. Not anymore. Someday, I will follow my allies to Earth. Or perhaps answer the call of the Reef…" —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Collectible Detector III

3817061966.displaySource: "Your Vanguard wishes to secure Europa, yes? To preserve history. To remember. Variks understands this." —Variks the Loyal

displayProperties.description: Speak with Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Reclaiming Europa

setData.questStepSummary: Eramis is defeated, but House Salvation remains. Variks has offered to help you take back Europa from them.

3593342632.displaySource: "The Fallen of House Salvation produce dangerous weapons on Europa. Weapons that could threaten our defensive efforts all across the system." —Commander Zavala

setData.questStepSummary: Now that Eramis is defeated, Variks and the Vanguard want your help dismantling what remains of House Salvation. Your first assignment is to sabotage the factory where the Fallen produce their weaponry.

displayProperties.description: Visit Variks in Charon's Crossing.
displayProperties.name: Reclaiming Europa

3593342633.displaySource: "Bring Variks what you found. Perhaps we can make a trade, yes?" —Variks the Loyal

2975357706.displaySource: "Clovis left behind a Skeleton Key to the secrets of Europa, but never told me how to use it. In my dark future, I figured out it needed to be empowered with different types of energy. I used it to unlock Clovis's journal then. But in this timeline, it remains locked." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Skeleton Key requires energy to empower it. The Exo Stranger believes that defeating Fallen and using Stasis abilities should help you to do so.

displayProperties.description:
- Complete Vanguard playlist activities with your Stasis subclass equipped.

2975357707.displaySource: "The Skeleton Key requires further empowerment. Let's try something a bit more significant—somewhere you can take on many enemies with Stasis in a short period of time." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Exo Stranger wants you to further empower the Skeleton Key by using Stasis to defeat many combatants. Vanguard playlist activities should give you that opportunity.

2975357704.displaySource: "You're very close. There's a Fallen Captain that's been holed up, causing trouble in one of the Exoscience buildings. Taking them out should do it." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Skeleton Key is almost ready. The Stranger believes one more boost of energy from combatants near a Crux should do it. Find Weniks, Salvation Elite Captain and eliminate their platoon.

2975357705.displaySource: "The Skeleton Key's ready. Come find me at my family's secret bunker and use it to unlock the journal. It's time to expose that which Clovis desired to stay hidden." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Skeleton Key is fully empowered. It's time to rendezvous with the Exo Stranger.

displayProperties.description: Regroup with the Exo Stranger in Beyond.
displayProperties.name: Born in Darkness Part 1

2975357710.displaySource:
"I realize now, our search for the Stasis Clovis found will always intertwine with my family's past, and my dark future. I'm sorry I left abruptly… but talk of family… always makes me uncomfortable."

"Perhaps one day, Ana and I will be reunited. Until then… Clovis's journal may have led me to find something Stasis related. If so, I think you should have it. Come find me near the campsite in a bit." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: Thanks to the new data recovered, the Exo Stranger now has a gift for you related to Stasis.

displayProperties.description:
• Defeat Vex on Europa for their energy.
• Get Stasis shatter final blows by shattering frozen combatants and stasis crystals on Europa.

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These quests are no longer required for unlocking Stasis upgrades.

Stasis upgrades can now be directly purchased from the Exo Stranger on Europa.

285715023.displaySource: "Poring through Clovis's journal revealed to me just where his next decryption algorithm is hidden, and how to empower the Skeleton Key to access it. The answer lies in the Vex, and as always, Darkness." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Skeleton Key once again requires energy to empower it. The Exo Stranger believes that energy from the radiolarian fluid inside Vex and the usage of Stasis abilities should help you do so.

displayProperties.description:
- Complete playlist activities with your Stasis subclass equipped.

285715022.displaySource: "This is a bit unusual, I know—but the Skeleton Key is not yet fully empowered, and we have an opportunity here to test our Stasis skills on ourselves. If you feel comfortable with that, of course. If not, continue to empower it through our enemies. It never hurts to thin their ranks." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Exo Stranger wants you to further empower the Skeleton Key so you can decrypt more of Clovis's journal. Do so by using Stasis to defeat combatants or other Guardians. Playlist activities such as Crucible or Vanguard Operations should give you that opportunity.

285715020.displaySource: "Now that the Skeleton Key's empowered once again, bring it to me and let's untangle more of Clovis's secrets." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Skeleton Key is fully empowered. It's time to rendezvous with the Exo Stranger and further decrypt Clovis's journal.

285715019.displaySource: "Digging further into Clovis's journal is really paying off. Or I should say, Clovis's Golden Age experiments with Stasis are finally paying off. At least they're doing so for us, and not for him. Come to me at the campsite and our findings are yours to keep." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: Thanks to the new data recovered, the Exo Stranger has another Stasis-related gift for you.

displayProperties.description:
• Defeat Vex and Fallen on Europa for their residual Darkness energy.
• Use Stasis abilities against combatants on Europa.
displayProperties.name: Born in Darkness Part 3

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These quests are no longer required for unlocking Stasis upgrades.

Stasis upgrades can now be directly purchased from the Exo Stranger on Europa.

2205014136.displaySource: "In Clovis's research, he discovered traces of Darkness energy in every one of his subjects. Humans, Vex, even animals. We know now Darkness truly does reside within us all. Further decrypting Clovis's journal has pinpointed our next decryption algorithm, but to get there, we must begin by empowering the Skeleton Key with Darkness." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Skeleton Key needs to be empowered again, this time with Darkness residual energy from our foes. The Exo Stranger believes Darkness exists in every living being in some form, and the energy can be collected. She then implores you to continue honing your Stasis skills, which will also contribute the needed energy for the Skeleton Key.

displayProperties.description:
• Complete Gambit activities with your Stasis subclass equipped.
• Use Stasis abilities against combatants in Gambit.
displayProperties.name: Born in Darkness Part 3

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These quests are no longer required for unlocking Stasis upgrades.

Stasis upgrades can now be directly purchased from the Exo Stranger on Europa.

2205014137.displaySource: "I know just the place to gain plenty of Darkness energy for the Skeleton Key: Gambit, or as I have sometimes referred to it to poke fun, Drifter's Darkness Revue. Using Stasis against our enemies there should give you the boost you need." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: You can further empower the Skeleton Key by using Stasis to defeat combatants in Gambit, since they are brimming with Darkness. The Exo Stranger believes it will provide quite the boost towards empowering the key.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Teraks's platoon near the Crux of Darkness in Eternity.
displayProperties.name: Born in Darkness Part 3

tooltipNotifications.displayString:

2205014138.displaySource: "Let's cap it off with a bit of Ether. Another of House Salvation's 'elite' have taken residence over in the Exoscience building. Put an end to it." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Skeleton Key is almost ready. The Stranger believes one more boost of energy from combatants near a Crux should do it. Find Teraks, Salvation Elite Captain and eliminate their platoon.

2205014139.displaySource: "You've done it. Now hurry to me. I invited Ana along this time after our last conversation, and we have much to uncover together." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Skeleton Key is fully empowered. It's time to rendezvous with the Exo Stranger.

displayProperties.description: Regroup with the Exo Stranger in Beyond.

tooltipNotifications.displayString:

2205014140.displaySource: "Ana will come around… I hope. In the meantime, Clovis's journal has turned up another Stasis enhancement, and I want you to have it. You know where to find me." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: Thanks to the new data recovered, the Exo Stranger has another Stasis-related gift for you.

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants on Europa using Stasis abilities.
displayProperties.name: Born in Darkness Part 4

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These quests are no longer required for unlocking Stasis upgrades.

Stasis upgrades can now be directly purchased from the Exo Stranger on Europa.

1891580901.displaySource: "With our journal decrypted, we know where the final bit of Stasis research is. Like I said, with the man himself. But before we reach the AI, the key will need to be empowered one last time. The journal implies the key should unlock something within the AI, and that we'll find what we're looking for in doing so. Start by using Stasis to empower the Skeleton Key with Darkness. We'll go from there." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: You're ready to empower the Skeleton Key for the last time, but this time, with as much Darkness energy as possible. The Exo Stranger implores you once again to take this opportunity to embrace Stasis to do so, claiming it to be the best way to empower the key.

displayProperties.name: Born in Darkness Part 4

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These quests are no longer required for unlocking Stasis upgrades.

Stasis upgrades can now be directly purchased from the Exo Stranger on Europa.

1891580900.displaySource: "Seems like we'll need more Darkness energy than usual to empower the key this time. So we'll take Stasis to some of our more powerful enemies. You've got this." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Exo Stranger shares that you'll need an immense amount of Darkness energy to empower the Skeleton Key this time. She asks that you take on powerful combatants to do so.

1891580903.displaySource: "One final burst of energy, and we'll have what we need to face the Clovis AI together. There's a Fallen Captain that's been making its way towards him. Taking it down should be all you need." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Skeleton Key is almost ready. The Stranger believes one more boost of energy from combatants near a Crux should do it.

tooltipNotifications.displayString:

1891580902.displaySource:
"This is it. Communing with the Clovis AI should lead us to his final Stasis research… though I am hardly looking forward to speaking to him again."

"I don't just have a history with the man himself. The AI and I had troubles of our own long ago. In fact, it was I who shut him down in the first place. I doubt he'll be happy to see me again." —The Exo Stranger

setData.questStepSummary: The Skeleton Key is fully empowered. It's time to rendezvous with the Exo Stranger.

1891580897.displaySource: "If I never have to speak to that bastard again, it'll be too soon. At least we got what we came for. As usual, it's potent Stasis energy, but it needs to be harnessed. Come find me at the campsite and it's yours."

setData.questStepSummary: Thanks to the new data recovered, the Exo Stranger now has potent Stasis energy for you.

displayProperties.name: The Oracle

displayProperties.description: Search the Dreaming City for signs of Akasha.
displayProperties.name: The Ascendant

setData.questStepSummary: "I know Akasha. She's not looking for a Guardian, she's looking for the unknown. Whether it's the Aphelion, secrets of the Curse, or traces of Savathûn's influence. She's there looking for one thing: answers." —Micah-10

displayProperties.name: The Past

setData.questStepSummary: "The time rifts on Mars are so unpredictable. Most of the time they're unstable, ghostly. Then sometimes they snap into focus and present a moment out of time as real as any other. It's a shame we can't actually affect the past through them." —Ghost

displayProperties.description: Search Mars for signs of Citrine.
displayProperties.name: The Past

setData.questStepSummary: "Mars has always been a battleground. First with the Cabal, then the Hive, and now… different Hive. Regardless, it's a terrible place and I don't recommend staying long." —Micah-10

displayProperties.description: Return to the Arbor of Light in the Pale Heart to restore the lost Ghost.

displayProperties.description: Search for Ghost telemetry in mission "The Communion" on Europa.
displayProperties.name: The Veiled

setData.questStepSummary: "I… I don't like the idea of going back into that Pyramid, Guardian. But we don't have any other choice." —Ghost

displayProperties.description: Search Europa for signs of Anwar.
displayProperties.name: The Veiled

setData.questStepSummary: "Europa brings back a lot of memories, new and old. It's hard not to feel sentimental when I see the snow drifts and ice. For me, that moon has only ever meant one thing: change." —Micah-10

displayProperties.description: Return to the Arbor of Light in the Pale Heart to restore the lost Ghost.
displayProperties.name: The Veiled

setData.questStepSummary: "Anwar… would've wanted his shell bathed in the Light of the Traveler. We should honor those wishes." —Micah-10

displayProperties.description: Return to the Arbor of Light to discuss next steps.
displayProperties.name: The Veiled

setData.questStepSummary: "Come on back to the Arbor, we… we can talk about what happened to Anwar." —Micah-10.

displayProperties.description: Search for Ghost telemetry in mission "The Cunning" in Savathûn's throne world.
displayProperties.name: The Illusion

setData.questStepSummary: "I hate being in Savathûn's throne world. I can feel her eyes on us wherever we are. Even when she was dead, it felt like she was watching us. And now… I know she is." —Ghost

displayProperties.description: Search the Throne World for a damaged Ghost.
displayProperties.name: The Illusion

setData.questStepSummary: "You can't trust anything Savathûn says or does. That goes doubly so in a world built from the cursed weight of her soul." —Micah-10

displayProperties.description: Return to the Arbor of Light in the Pale Heart to restore the lost Ghost.
displayProperties.name: The Illusion

displayProperties.name: The Visitation

setData.questStepSummary: "The lunar Pyramid. This… this was where we came face-to-face with the Witness for the first time. I hate it there." —Ghost

displayProperties.description: Search the Moon for signs of Balthazar.
displayProperties.name: The Visitation

setData.questStepSummary: "The lunar Pyramid is where the Witness reached out to us, to try and sell us the same lie the Hive bought. Be wary, Guardian. There's no telling what still dwells in that thing." —Micah-10

displayProperties.description: Return to the Arbor of Light in the Pale Heart to restore the lost Ghost.
displayProperties.name: The Visitation

setData.questStepSummary: "Balthazar could use a little boost of extra Light to get on his way. Thankfully, we have an abundant source on hand in the Arbor." —Micah-10

setData.questStepSummary: "Come on back to the Arbor, we can discuss your findings." —Micah-10

displayProperties.name: The Desperation

setData.questStepSummary: "Well, this brings back memories. The Cosmodrome always does. I guess it's appropriate, then, that we end where we began." —Ghost

displayProperties.description: Search the Cosmodrome for signs of Hecate.
displayProperties.name: The Desperation

setData.questStepSummary: "There's a tale of a Guardian and a Ghost that have walked together through insurmountable odds. Ghosts love that one. Maybe I'll tell it to you some time." —Micah-10

displayProperties.description: Return to the Arbor of Light in the Pale Heart to restore the lost Ghost.
displayProperties.name: The Desperation

setData.questStepSummary: "Hecate could use a little boost of extra Light to get her on her way. Thankfully, we have an abundant source on hand in the Arbor." —Micah-10

displayProperties.description: Cross the threshold and discover what lies within the Traveler.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Operation: Ahamkara is a go. Follow the Vanguard through the portal, wherever it leads.

displayProperties.description: Speak with an old friend at the campfire.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: It's hard to believe, but it's really Cayde. There's little time to rest, but you can at least stop for a word before you go.

displayProperties.description: Confer with Ghost at Refuge of Speakers.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost looks troubled; find out what's on his mind.

displayProperties.description: Begin your trek through the Pale Heart and search for Crow.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Cayde relayed to us that Crow had ventured further into the Pale Heart to scout but hasn't reported back. We need to find him. He could be in danger.

displayProperties.description: Join Cayde and Crow in Refuge of Repose.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Now that we've found Crow, we should see what he has to report.

displayProperties.description: Confer with Ghost at Refuge of Repose.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Speak to Ghost about finding Ikora and Zavala.

displayProperties.description: Listen to the radio at Refuge of Repose.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary:
Your comrades in arms have additional insight.

Go to the radio on the campfire table and hear what they have to say.

displayProperties.description: Search for the wreckage of Ikora's ship.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Crow and Glint saw Ikora's crashed ship near the part of the Pale Heart that resembles Io—a place that has special meaning to Ikora. Finding that ship should make her trail clear to follow.

displayProperties.description: Reunite with Ikora and Cayde at Refuge of Silver Wings.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: The last time Ikora saw Cayde alive he was leaving the Tower to handle the crisis in the Prison of Elders. It's hard to guess how she'll react.

displayProperties.description: Confer with Ghost at Refuge of Silver Wings.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Speak to Ghost about finding Zavala.

displayProperties.description: Listen to the radio at Refuge of Silver Wings.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary:
Your comrades in arms have additional insight.

Go to the radio on the campfire table and hear what they have to say.

displayProperties.description: Press further ahead through the Pale Heart and look for Zavala.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Commander Zavala is still missing, but without a specific fix on his location all there is to do is push forward through the Witness's forces. Head deeper into the Pale Heart in search of him.

displayProperties.description: Confer with Ghost at Refuge of Home.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Cracks are showing in the Vanguard's united front. Get Ghost's thoughts.

displayProperties.description: Listen to the radio at Refuge of Home.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary:
Your comrades in arms have additional insight.

Go to the radio on the campfire table and hear what they have to say.

displayProperties.description: Scale the treacherous ice wall with Cayde and Crow.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: A towering, icy wall blocks our way. As with everything in this strange place, it's a reminder of our past, made new—the Cosmodrome Wall. Join Cayde and Crow on the climb.

displayProperties.description: Discuss the next move with Ikora, Zavala, and Crow.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Ikora and Zavala are at odds on how to proceed. There are too many unknowns, and no obvious way forward.

displayProperties.description: Confer with Ghost at Refuge of Beginnings.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost seems buoyed by what you've seen. Get his thoughts.

displayProperties.description: Listen to the radio at Refuge of Beginnings.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary:
Your comrades in arms have additional insight.

Go to the radio on the campfire table and hear what they have to say.

displayProperties.description: Attempt to commune with the Traveler in the Broken Deep.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Venture into the deepest chasms of the Pale Heart with Cayde and Crow and attempt to commune with the Traveler.

displayProperties.description: Attempt to commune with the Traveler in the Forgotten Deep.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary:
The Broken Deep yielded no answers.

Glint suggests searching the Forgotten Deep next. Perhaps that delve will lead you to answers.

displayProperties.description: Attempt to commune with the Traveler in the Blooming Deep.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Strike two. With only one potential candidate left, you descend into the Blooming Deep to commune with the Traveler.

displayProperties.description: Confer with Ghost at Refuge of Beginnings.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost seems rattled. Talk to him about what's on his mind.

displayProperties.description: Listen to the radio at Refuge of Beginnings.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary:
Your comrades in arms have additional insight.

Go to the radio on the campfire table and hear what they have to say.

displayProperties.description: Clear a path through a blighted pass, and uncover a long-buried past.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Cayde's vision leaves us with more questions than answers. Despite the fireteam's uncertainty, the destination remains the same: the Witness's spire. Forge ahead.

displayProperties.description: Crow is going to try to talk Zavala down. This may not end well.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Zavala is set on his course of action, but Crow is equally determined to keep him from doing something reckless. Years of pain come to a head.

displayProperties.description: Confer with Ghost at Refuge of Wishes.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Zavala won't be talked out of his course of action. Ghost looks worried.

displayProperties.description: Help Targe find Zavala, before it's too late.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Zavala struck out on his own, and isn't responding to anyone. Targe needs our help to track him down. Strike out into the storm and find Zavala.

displayProperties.description: Support Zavala at Refuge of Endings.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Zavala mourns Targe. You can't understand the depths of his loss, but you can at least be there for him.

displayProperties.description: Confer with Ghost at Refuge of Endings.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost is visibly distressed by Targe's death. Offer what comfort you can.

displayProperties.description: Confront the Witness in the place where it was made.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Targe's sacrifice and Zavala's vision have illuminated our path forward.

displayProperties.description: Confer with Ghost in the Lost City.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost is struggling. It's your turn to support him, like he's supported you all this time.

displayProperties.description: Complete the "Destined Heroes" quest.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: To defeat the Witness, you need more than Light or Darkness alone. Strengthen your bonds with your allies and the paracausal forces you wield.

displayProperties.description: Track down an unknown threat with Cayde and Crow.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Micah-10 has informed us of an unknown threat brewing. Cayde has volunteered us, and Crow, to help him investigate this lead. The fewer bad guys on the field, the better for our efforts.

displayProperties.description:
The final shape looms. There isn't much time to prepare.

You won't be able to defeat the Witness alone. Recover powerful artifacts across the Pale Heart, rally your allies, and fortify the Traveler's Light. Only through your combined strength will you prevail.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: "We're not out of this yet." Ghost says with a determined stare in the direction of the monolith. "Mara has a plan, our allies are here. It's time we get moving, meet up with Micah-10, and figure out what her plan is to help us defeat the Witness. We can't do this alone…' Ghost looks at you intently. "And we don't have to. Come on, it's time."

displayProperties.description: Confront and unmake the Witness.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary:
We've gathered our allies, strengthened our connection to Light and Darkness, and prepared every resource at our disposal.

We're as ready as we'll ever be.

We must end the Witness, before it ends everything.

displayProperties.description: Return with Ghost to the Lost City in the Pale Heart.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: In the wake of the final shape, the entire universe seems to hold its breath.

displayProperties.description: Confer with Ghost in the Lost City.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost remains quiet throughout the celebrations. Check in and see what he's thinking about.

displayProperties.description:
Investigate an unknown threat with Cayde and Crow.

Complete the mission "Wild Card."
displayProperties.name: Wild Card

setData.questStepSummary: You, Cayde, and Crow set out to investigate an unknown threat that is stirring in the Pale Heart. Track it down and destroy it.

displayProperties.description: Listen to the radio transmission in the Lost City Tower.
displayProperties.name: Wild Card

setData.questStepSummary: The radio in the Lost City Tower crackles with an incoming transmission.

displayProperties.description: Speak to Cayde-6.
displayProperties.name: Wild Card

setData.questStepSummary: Cayde has something to give you. Go chat with him.

displayProperties.description: Find a manifestation of Darkness in the cave in the Seclusion.
displayProperties.name: Found in the Dark

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost says your actions have caused paracausal ripples throughout the Pale Heart. He thinks these ripples may manifest in a wellspring of power in the cave in the Seclusion.

displayProperties.description: Investigate Shadow Legion activity in the Transgression.
displayProperties.name: Found in the Dark

setData.questStepSummary: Help Caiatl investigate Shadow Legion activity in the Transgression.

displayProperties.description: Return to the cave in the Seclusion and commune with the Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Found in the Dark

setData.questStepSummary:
Your conflict with the Shadow Legion has woken a connection to the Darkness within you. 

Return to the cave in the Seclusion.

displayProperties.description: Destroy Shadow Legion mining operations in the Divide.
displayProperties.name: Found in the Dark

setData.questStepSummary: Join Caiatl and Zavala in destroying the Shadow Legion mining operations in the Divide.

displayProperties.description:
Paracausal ripples have unearthed a manifestation of Darkness. 

Return to the cave in the Seclusion.
displayProperties.name: Found in the Dark

setData.questStepSummary:
This time, the ripple of paracausal force is so strong that you can feel its pull like a gravity well.

Return to the cave in the Seclusion.

displayProperties.description: Find a manifestation of the Light in the cave in the Refraction.
displayProperties.name: Lost in the Light

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost says your actions have caused paracausal ripples throughout the Pale Heart. He thinks these ripples may manifest in a wellspring of power in the cave in the Refraction.

displayProperties.description: Uncover House Salvation's operations in the Blooming.
displayProperties.name: Lost in the Light

setData.questStepSummary: Work with Mithrax to hack House Salvation's network and gain information about their operations in the Blooming.

displayProperties.description: Return to the cave in the Refraction and commune with the Light.
displayProperties.name: Lost in the Light

setData.questStepSummary:
Your experiences at the Tree in the Blooming have brought you closer to the Light.

Return to the cave in the Refraction.

displayProperties.description: Launch "The Hollow, Part II" to travel to Europa and eliminate the Wrathborn threat.
displayProperties.name: Lost in the Light

setData.questStepSummary: Travel to Europa with Mithrax to eliminate the Wrathborn threat to the Traveler at its source.

displayProperties.description:
Paracausal ripples have unearthed a manifestation of Light. 

Return to the cave in the Refraction.
displayProperties.name: Lost in the Light

setData.questStepSummary:
This time, the ripple of paracausal force is so strong that you can feel it like a riptide.

Return to the cave in the Refraction.

displayProperties.description: There's a strange radio transmission coming from the old Tower in the Lost City… and it's using a Hive frequency.
displayProperties.name: Destined Heroes

setData.questStepSummary: The Vanguard radio frequency is being overridden by a Hive broadcast signal. Listen to the message and find out who is behind the comms disruption.

displayProperties.description: Investigate the activity of Savathûn's Lucent Hive near the portal.
displayProperties.name: Destined Heroes

setData.questStepSummary: Savathûn has finally revealed herself, but she's still got plenty of secrets to keep. We need to find out what she's playing at.

displayProperties.description: Speak to Micah-10 through her conduit in the Arbor of Light.
displayProperties.name: Destined Heroes

setData.questStepSummary:
We've been contacted by Micah-10, a legendary Guardian and old friend of Cayde's.

Go to the Arbor of Light in the undercroft of the old Tower to contact her.

displayProperties.description: Talk to Cayde-6 in the Lost City.
displayProperties.name: Destined Heroes

setData.questStepSummary:
Cayde says he needs your help with 'Operation Super-Secret-Hush-Hush'. 

Some things never change. You should probably go see what this is about.

displayProperties.description: Ghost has something he wants to talk to you about. Go to the ledge of the old Tower in the Lost City to speak with him.
displayProperties.name: Destined Heroes

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost seems to have something on his mind. Have a chat with him.

displayProperties.description: Talk to Ghost to begin the quests "Lost in the Light" and "Found in the Dark." Work with your allies to explore the possibility of synergy between Light and Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Destined Heroes

setData.questStepSummary:
Ghost has found some leads for us to chase. 

One points towards the Light's effects on the physical universe.

The other points towards Darkness's influence on minds and emotions.

displayProperties.description: Investigate spikes in Taken energy in the Refraction.
displayProperties.name: Destined Heroes

setData.questStepSummary: Since arriving in the Pale Heart, we've learned so much, and discovered so many secrets. So, of course, Savathûn wants a piece.

displayProperties.description: Go to the Lost City and confer with Ghost.
displayProperties.name: Destined Heroes

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost has a few thoughts about this new power, but it's not safe to have that discussion here. Find a safe place in the Lost City to confer with Ghost.

displayProperties.description: Use the Dyadic Prism to access the new landing zone in the Sacrarium and claim your destiny.
displayProperties.name: Destined Heroes

setData.questStepSummary: We're breaking new ground in paracausality. Ghost thinks we need to unify Light and Darkness into a coherent force.

displayProperties.description: Explore the search area to find the missing, possibly injured, Ghost.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Rootbound

setData.questStepSummary: Micah-10's flock of unpartnered Ghosts have scattered through the Pale Heart, called by something no one else can hear. They have not returned, and they have no partners to protect them. Follow the traces they have left to bring them home safely.

displayProperties.description: Investigate the new growth in the Arbor of Light.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Rootbound

setData.questStepSummary: Something about the Arbor has changed. Ghost can feel it too. Take a look around to see what may have grown.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Micah in the Arbor of Light to assess the injured Ghost's wounds.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Rootbound

setData.questStepSummary: One lost Ghost has been recovered, but with significant damage. Take it back to the Arbor of Light, and to Micah-10, to see if the Traveler's Light can help it.

displayProperties.description: Acquire a Flickering Blessing mod by opening chests anywhere in the Pale Heart. Pathfinder field assignment chests have a massively higher chance of granting Traveler's Blessing mods.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Underbrush

setData.questStepSummary: In exploring the Pale Heart, you've discovered the Traveler's Light taking shapes that augment your powers. Seek out more of the Traveler's Blessings.

displayProperties.description:
Equip the new Flickering Blessing.

Flickering Blessings are a type of Traveler's Blessings. These are powerful combat mods that are only active while in the Pale Heart.

To equip: Open the Traveler's Blessings menu on the Pale Heart map.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Underbrush

setData.questStepSummary: With the Flickering Blessing acquired, it must be equipped in order to make use of its power.

displayProperties.description: Investigate the new growth in the Arbor of Light.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Underbrush

setData.questStepSummary: The growth of plants in the Arbor continues. Take a look around to see how they begin to flourish.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Micah in the Arbor of Light to discuss your new connection with the Light.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Underbrush

setData.questStepSummary: The Traveler's Blessings imbue you with the strength of the Light. Perhaps this additional Light may make some difference to the injured Ghost you saved.

displayProperties.description: Open Overthrow chests in the Landing to gain access to the location Micah indicated.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Greenery

setData.questStepSummary: The Witness's forces are still running wild in the Pale Heart. Before you can get into the place Micah mentioned, you'll need to restore balance to the larger area it's part of.

displayProperties.description:
Follow the vision of Light into the depths of the Pale Heart and fight the infection found there.

Complete Sword Dance Cyst.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Greenery

setData.questStepSummary: Clear the Witness's influence from the area so you can expose the injured Ghost to the Traveler's Light, which is stronger here than it is nearly anywhere else.

displayProperties.description: Return to the Lost City's Arbor of Light.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Greenery

setData.questStepSummary: The Ghost is looking much better. It's time to return to the Arbor of Light.

displayProperties.description: Investigate the new growth in the Arbor of Light.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Greenery

setData.questStepSummary: You can sense some new strength from the Traveler rising in response to your actions. The Arbor may have something new to show for your efforts. Perhaps you should return there.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Micah in the Arbor of Light to assess the injured Ghost's recovery.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Greenery

setData.questStepSummary: Although the specific workings of Light may be unclear, the injured Ghost is looking much livelier. Something has changed for the better.

displayProperties.description: Complete campaign missions on Cooperative Focus mode.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Budding

setData.questStepSummary: Though healing the injured Ghost was inarguably vital, there's still work to do out in the rest of the Pale Heart—work best done with a fireteam. Gather allies and set out to uproot the Witness's forces once more.

displayProperties.description: Return to the Arbor of Light.
displayProperties.name: Convalescence: Budding

setData.questStepSummary: You've done significant work to excise the Witness's influence from the Pale Heart. Return to the Arbor of Light to see your work reflected and talk with Micah-10.

displayProperties.description:
Micah has picked up the coordinates of another injured Ghost. Acquire this quest to begin another recovery operation.

Possible Rewards:
—Bold Endings (Hand Cannon)
—Axial Lacuna (Fusion Rifle)
—False Idols (Sword)
displayProperties.name: Alone in the Dark

setData.questStepSummary: "The work these Ghosts are doing will take years to complete. We need to be there for them until the Traveler is fully healed." —Micah-10

displayProperties.description: Find the lost Ghost within the search area.
displayProperties.name: Alone in the Dark

setData.questStepSummary: Somewhere out there is a Ghost, damaged and alone. Without a Guardian's help, they may never get home.

displayProperties.description: Open Overthrow chests near the location where you found the Ghost to begin healing the infection.
displayProperties.name: Alone in the Dark

setData.questStepSummary: "The Traveler's enemies are overrunning the Pale Heart. They fester in the Traveler's wounds. Purge their foul influence." —Micah-10

displayProperties.description:
The cyst has mutated, and you cannot take the damaged Ghost through in its current state.

Commune with the bird of Light to invert the cyst.
displayProperties.name: Alone in the Dark

setData.questStepSummary: "Sometimes, to move forward, you need to look at the path from a different perspective. Change your viewpoint and see what you can find." —Micah-10

displayProperties.description: Follow the vision of Light into the depths of the Pale Heart and fight the infection found there.
displayProperties.name: Alone in the Dark

setData.questStepSummary: "This Ghost has been separated from the Traveler's Light. It needs an infusion of Light to get back up and running, and I think I know just the place." —Micah-10

displayProperties.description: Return to the Lost City's Arbor of Light.
displayProperties.name: Alone in the Dark

setData.questStepSummary: The Ghost is looking much better. It's time to return to the Arbor of Light.

displayProperties.description: Visit Micah-10 for a reward.
displayProperties.name: Alone in the Dark

setData.questStepSummary: The lost Ghost has been healed. Micah-10 will want to hear the good news—and give you a reward.

displayProperties.description: Complete "The Ghosts" mission.
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen
