setData.questStepSummary: Savathûn is defeated, but her throne world is still swarming with enemies, and the Witness is still at large. Ikora wishes to speak with you about the work yet to be done.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Ikora in the Enclave on Mars.
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen

setData.questStepSummary: Using the Relic, you have created a new weapon with the fragment found on Savathûn's ship. Ikora is eager to discuss your findings.

displayProperties.description: Complete "The Investigation" mission, which can be launched from the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen

setData.questStepSummary: Savathûn has acquired the Light, but no one knows how. Ikora believes the answers lie in the Witch Queen's throne world, and she wants you to investigate.

displayProperties.description: Speak with the rebel Ghost, Fynch.
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen

setData.questStepSummary: The rebel Hive Ghost you encountered in Savathûn's throne world claims he has information that can help you. The claim seems suspicious, but you have no other leads…

displayProperties.description: Complete "The Arrival" mission.
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen

setData.questStepSummary: Mars has returned from the abyss, and Savathûn's ship hovers in its sky. Ikora Rey and Eris Morn require your assistance to track down the elusive Witch Queen.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Ikora in the Enclave on Mars.
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen

setData.questStepSummary: Savathûn and her followers, the Lucent Brood, have found a way to channel the Light. Ikora awaits you in the Enclave to hear more about what you've seen.

displayProperties.description: Bring the Osmic Fragment to the Hidden in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Hard Evidence

3478646613.displaySource: "It's Osmium; the stuff's all over the Throne World. Gotta be something else about this little chunk getting the Lucent Brood so agitated." —Fynch

setData.questStepSummary: Fynch is convinced this fragment is evidence of a shady Lucent Brood plot. He insists you take it back to the Hidden.

displayProperties.description: Search Quagmire for a sample to match the Osmic Fragment.
displayProperties.name: Hard Evidence

1438667217.displaySource: "I'm reading a paracausal resonance. It's faint, but it matches what you felt from Fynch's fragment. We'll need another sample for comparison." —Ghost

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost has picked up a promising signal in Quagmire. Searching there should turn up a sample for analysis.

displayProperties.description: Defeat the Lucent Brood ambush.
displayProperties.name: Hard Evidence

279735181.displaySource: "I'm reading a paracausal resonance. It's faint, but it matches what you felt from Fynch's fragment. We'll need another sample for comparison." —Ghost

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost has picked up a promising signal in Quagmire. Searching there should turn up a sample for analysis.

displayProperties.description: Log the Osmic Fragment on the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Hard Evidence

2852332270.displaySource: "Takes a supernova to make Osmium, and even then, you don't get much. The Hive hail from a continent made of dead stars. There's some insight into their minds." —LAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: According to Fynch, this fragment is evidence of a sinister Lucent Brood plot. It pulses mysteriously. Submit it to the Evidence Board to learn more.

displayProperties.description: Review the case on the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Hard Evidence

601035050.displaySource: "If the evidence isn't pointing you in a direction, then more evidence IS your direction." —Agent LAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: You've confirmed Fynch's theory about the Osmic Fragment and a Lucent Brood plot, but you've got a long way to go before you can close this case.

displayProperties.description: The Hidden have new intel. Check the Evidence Board in the Enclave for details.
displayProperties.name: Report: RESONANCE-COMP

3681035059.displaySource: "You'd be surprised at how much of this job is combing through data, but things only get found when no one's shooting at you." —Agent LAI-701

displayProperties.description: Search all 3 locations for the sources of the resonance.
displayProperties.name: Report: RESONANCE-COMP

3759043227.displaySource: "A good clue is like a strong cup of coffee. In that I need more of both to finish this." —Agent LAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: The Hidden report 3 instances of a complementary resonance in the Throne World. Search Miasma, Florescent Canal, and Quagmire for the sources.

displayProperties.description: Follow the new resonance to Witch's Echo to collect another Osmic Fragment.
displayProperties.name: Report: RESONANCE-COMP

4028677861.displaySource: "Even in a non-Euclidean space like Savathûn's throne world, triangulation can still work! It just means the math is a lot more exciting." —Hidden agent

setData.questStepSummary: The resonance led you to a trio of ominous Hive runes. After a quick scan, Ghost picks up a new signal—for an Osmic Fragment—in Witch's Echo.

displayProperties.description: Collect the Osmic Fragment.
displayProperties.name: Report: RESONANCE-COMP

771946386.displaySource: "Producing a counter waveform to a paracausal artifact is advanced stuff. The Hive are investing a lot in whatever this is." —LAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: Savathûn's Ghost left behind key evidence. What is Immaru planning to do with this Osmic Fragment?

displayProperties.description: Report your findings on the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: RESONANCE-COMP

1373679496.displaySource: "Old evidence can mean new leads. Invent a new procedure, have a new insight… you want it all carefully cataloged." —LAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: In Witch's Echo, Savathûn's Ghost sicced the Lucent Brood on you. But you made it out with another Osmic Fragment and a new prime suspect.

displayProperties.description: Review the case on the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: RESONANCE-COMP

3447101136.displaySource: "Oh boy, where to start with Immaru… He's the anti-Savathûn. Reactionary. Emotional. Everything to prove." —Fynch

displayProperties.description: The Hidden have new intel. Check the Evidence Board in the Enclave for details.
displayProperties.name: Report: ALTAR-REFLECT

2252706772.displaySource: "This throne world is folded up to hide its secrets like… psychic origami. Every edge we tug on turns up something." —Agent LAI-701

displayProperties.description: Bring the Enigma to the new access point at the Altar of Reflection in the Temple of the Wrathful and see what you can uncover.
displayProperties.name: Report: ALTAR-REFLECT

667149743.displaySource: "Savathûn's Altar reacts to your presence, and the presence of others like Immaru. It might react to other meaningful things." —Agent LAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: The Altar seems to have become an ever-shifting space, making it an excellent place to search for clues.

displayProperties.description: Report your findings to the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: ALTAR-REFLECT

2737223175.displaySource: "Failure is always an option. Don't start until you're sure losing can still further your agenda. Savathûn knew this, and so should you." —Agent LAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: The ever-changing Altar has proven to hold some truths about Savathûn's secrets, namely her connection to the Relic and the Enigma it shaped.

displayProperties.description: Review the case on the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: ALTAR-REFLECT

1427441235.displaySource: "Savathûn really thought getting her old memories back would make her more dangerous. And… well… it did." —Fynch

setData.questStepSummary: The Altar raised more questions than it answered, but it did fill in an important blank about Savathûn's link to the Relic and the Enigma it shaped.

displayProperties.description: The Hidden have new intel. Check the Evidence Board in the Enclave for details.
displayProperties.name: Report: SCORN-ORDER

37214073.displaySource: "Rummaging around a battlefield in the aftermath… it's definitely not pleasant work, but it does yield interesting results." —Agent LAI-701

displayProperties.description: Target challenging Scorn in free roam within the Throne World to intercept their marching orders.
displayProperties.name: Report: SCORN-ORDER

2367271818.displaySource: "Scorn lines of communication? Almost nonexistent. Not a lot to eavesdrop; they're not exactly chatty. Easier to get info from the source." —Agent LAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: You know the Scorn are after Immaru's runes, but you don't know why. Target challenging Scorn to intercept their marching orders.

displayProperties.description: Thwart the Scorn's scheme and collect any relevant evidence at "The Wellspring: Defend," which is available every other day.
displayProperties.name: Report: SCORN-ORDER

2939480229.displaySource: "Things have gotten real… uh, competitive over at the Wellspring. I'm not surprised the Scorn are trying to get a leg up, so to speak." —Fynch

setData.questStepSummary: The orders reveal a plan to use the Lucent Hive's "defensive" runes against them. Assemble a fireteam to thwart the Scorn's scheme at the Wellspring.

displayProperties.description: Report your findings at the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: SCORN-ORDER

3781767562.displaySource: "Leave your metaphysical souvenir with us. I want to run some more tests… Sweep it for bugs and scrying effects." —Agent LAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: The Scorn's defense of the Wellspring has been upended. No Hive runes turned up, but you did find another Osmic Fragment.

displayProperties.description: Review the case on the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: SCORN-ORDER

30332710.displaySource: "Basic strategy, isn't it? Your enemy needs a resource, you try and control it first. Let's hope that's the only thing motivating the Scorn." —Agent LAI-701

displayProperties.description: The Hidden have new intel. Check the Evidence Board in the Enclave for details.
displayProperties.name: Report: RELIC-DATA

3201315258.displaySource: "I've hit it with every tool in my high-tech belt, and all I can say is… it's probably not hollow. That much I got from knocking on it." —Agent LAI-701

displayProperties.description: Shape Throne World weapons at the Relic in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: RELIC-DATA

2035309547.displaySource: "Calling it a 'schematic' is mostly just being polite. It's more like… like remembering how your grandma made pies." —Agent JAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: The Hidden have a list of Throne World weapons that can shed light on the link between Weapon Patterns and Osmic Fragments. Use that as a guide.

displayProperties.description: Gain Pattern unlock progress for Wellspring weapons.
displayProperties.name: Report: RELIC-DATA

1800422906.displaySource: "Calling it a 'schematic' is mostly just being polite. It's more like… like remembering how your grandma made pies." —Agent JAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: The Hidden have a list of Throne World weapons that can shed light on the link between Weapon Patterns and Osmic Fragments. Use that as a guide.

displayProperties.description: At the Relic in the Enclave on Mars, reshape a weapon with enhanced traits.
displayProperties.name: Report: RELIC-DATA

930832478.displaySource: "So far, we've been trying to study a gun without loading it. We need to actually chamber a round and let 'er rip… safely, of course." —Agent LAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: The Hidden believe the Osmic Fragments and the Weapon Patterns used by the Relic might be related. They need you to generate data by shaping weapons.

displayProperties.description: Report your findings to the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: RELIC-DATA

1702959929.displaySource: "Anything you leave here, we can keep studying while you're in the field. Consider us your backup brains!" —Agent LAI-701

setData.questStepSummary: It's confirmed: the Osmic Fragments are similar to the Weapon Patterns, but much weaker. It would take many Fragments to add up to one Pattern.

displayProperties.description: Report your findings to the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: RELIC-DATA

2221620153.displaySource: "So the Light isn't enough for Immaru and his Lucent Brood, huh? That's as ambitious as it is worrying." —Agent LAI-701

displayProperties.description: The Hidden have new intel. Check the Evidence Board in the Enclave for details.
displayProperties.name: Report: STEPS-RETRACED

3559473639.displaySource: "Nothing like a quiet night at home, curled up with a cup of coffee and a few old case files. I don't care what Kominski says. It's not weird."—Hidden agent

displayProperties.description: Discover new Insights by defeating Champions in weekly missions on any difficulty. Finishers drop additional Insights.
displayProperties.name: Report: STEPS-RETRACED

2740092152.displaySource: "Our future may have already been written, but our past is never through with us." —Ikora Rey

setData.questStepSummary: Retrace your steps through the Throne World to glean new insights from old cases.

displayProperties.description: Report your findings to the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: STEPS-RETRACED

2198664628.displaySource: "You look as though new enemies thought to challenge you, and instead became fuel for the flame that burns within you." —Ikora Rey

setData.questStepSummary: By retracing the steps of old cases in the Throne World, you've gleaned new insights that push forward your current investigation.

displayProperties.description: Review the case on the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: STEPS-RETRACED

493722940.displaySource: "These journeys into memory will be there when everything else has failed you." —Ikora Rey

displayProperties.description: The Hidden have new intel. Check the Evidence Board in the Enclave for details.
displayProperties.name: Report: PYRAMID-INSPECT

208310296.displaySource: "Looks like we've got new intel at the Evidence Board." —Ghost

displayProperties.description: Complete the "Preservation" mission and defeat Scorn to collect Hive runes.
displayProperties.name: Report: PYRAMID-INSPECT

2546111175.displaySource: "Don't underestimate the Scorn… especially considering their recent alliance with the Witness. They are unrelenting." —Mara Sov

setData.questStepSummary: The Scorn are amassing within the Sunken Pyramid in the Throne World. Investigate further to discover why and quell the uprising.

displayProperties.description: Report your findings to the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: PYRAMID-INSPECT

2669571139.displaySource: "The Scorn are retrofitting the runes to… infuse Hive worms into living creatures. Must be a continuation of Rhulk's experiments." —Ghost

setData.questStepSummary: The Scorn were hoarding Hive runes. Scans indicate a planned ritual—worms and Scorn as one. Just like how the Hive came to be…

displayProperties.description: Review the case on the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: PYRAMID-INSPECT

2141451951.displaySource: "Good work out there. We've almost got a full picture of what the Scorn are up to." —Ghost

displayProperties.description: The Hidden are ready to wrap up the case. Check the Evidence Board in the Enclave for next steps.
displayProperties.name: Report: REVERSE-LURE

984859733.displaySource: "Why don't you come in out of the cold, Guardian?"—Hidden agent

setData.questStepSummary: After reviewing the case, the Hidden have a plan of action. Return to the Evidence Board in the Enclave for next steps.

displayProperties.description: Take the Osmic Fragment from the Evidence Board in the Enclave to Queen's Bailey.
displayProperties.name: Report: REVERSE-LURE

997566004.displaySource: "You've got what he wants. That means he's focused, and you have all the options. Want is how we get people to act against their own best interests." —Hidden agent

setData.questStepSummary: Now that you know Immaru's scheme, you can turn the tables on him. Take the Osmic Fragment to Queen's Bailey to use as a lure.

displayProperties.description: Take the Osmic Fragment to Queen's Bailey to lure in Immaru and the Lucent Brood.
displayProperties.name: Report: REVERSE-LURE

1076383911.displaySource: "He'll come for it. Doesn't matter how obvious you make the trap. Greed will make a soul do stupid things. Not as stupid as love will… but it's close." —Hidden agent

setData.questStepSummary: According to the Hidden, Queen's Bailey is the site for Immaru's shaping ritual. Take the Osmic Fragment there to use as a lure.

displayProperties.description: Use Deepsight to reach a vantage point from which you can observe the lure.
displayProperties.name: Report: REVERSE-LURE

2168835075.displaySource: "The trap is set. The bait is out. Now we wait for the rat." —Hidden agent

setData.questStepSummary: Use Deepsight to reach a vantage point from which you can observe the lure. Once the Lucent Brood take the Osmic Fragment, they should lead you right to Immaru.

displayProperties.description: Verify that the Lucent Brood took the Osmic Fragment.
displayProperties.name: Report: REVERSE-LURE

3740507945.displaySource: "No sense reeling anything in if they didn't bite." —Hidden agent

setData.questStepSummary: You believe you saw the Lucent Brood take the Osmic Fragment. Verify that the bait was taken, then follow them.

displayProperties.description: Follow the Lucent Brood to Immaru's location in Queen's Bailey.
displayProperties.name: Report: REVERSE-LURE

3858918530.displaySource: "In retrospect, we probably should've asked Fynch to help with this part. A Hive Ghost would blend in a lot better than an armored Guardian."—Hidden agent

setData.questStepSummary: The Lucent Brood have taken the Osmic Fragment lure. If you follow them, they should lead you right to Immaru.

displayProperties.description: Defeat the Lucent Brood in Queen's Bailey.
displayProperties.name: Report: REVERSE-LURE

506874682.displaySource: "Engagement protocols! We have engagement protocols!" —Hidden agent

setData.questStepSummary: Immaru has ordered the Lucent Brood to attack. Defeat them so you can end this scheme once and for all.

displayProperties.description: Retrieve the Osmic Fragment and resonant runes.
displayProperties.name: Report: REVERSE-LURE

2666759724.displaySource: "Immaru blew through his reputation with the Hive putting this ritual together. Without it, the Osmium, or the runes, he'll be quiet. For a while, at least."—Hidden agent

setData.questStepSummary: Immaru escaped in the chaos, but he left behind the Osmic Fragment and the runes. Retrieve the evidence to ensure that he won't be attempting this scheme again.

displayProperties.description: Log your final report on the Evidence Board in the Enclave.
displayProperties.name: Report: REVERSE-LURE

374243063.displaySource: "Your informant gave you a rock. From that you uncovered—and stopped—a conspiracy to arm the Hive with new doomsday weapons. Now THAT is detective work." —Hidden agent

setData.questStepSummary: Immaru escaped, but his scheme has been foiled for good. Take the Osmic Fragment and the runes back to the Evidence Board and log your final report.

displayProperties.description: Shape your reward at the Relic.
displayProperties.name: Report: REVERSE-LURE

3907500186.displaySource: "Seems a shame to go through all this effort and not sate some curiosity. We've got the Relic all warmed up for you." —Hidden agent

setData.questStepSummary: Now that you've officially closed the case, you should go to the Relic and find out what weapon Immaru and the Lucent Brood planned on shaping.

displayProperties.description: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary:
With Savathûn taken care of, Mara Sov has arrived to help us acquire knowledge in preparation for The Witness.

Visit Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.

displayProperties.description: Complete the "Birthplace of the Vile" strike.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: Mara has asked that you take Savathûn's dying worm into the Throne World and find a way to revitalize it.

displayProperties.description: Visit Fynch.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: Your newly acquired Cryptoglyph is the key to fully revitalizing Savathûn's worm. But first, you'll need to re-energize it…

displayProperties.description: Locate a Cryptoglyph rune in the Temple of the Cunning.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: Fynch has transmitted details of a Cryptoglyph rune location. Track it down to re-energize the Cryptoglyph.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Scorn in the Throne World to charge the depleted rune.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: The rune has been drained of its power. Recharge it by defeating Scorn in the Throne World.

displayProperties.description: Find the entrance to the Sepulcher Lost Sector in the Florescent Canal.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: The Sepulcher Lost Sector awaits you somewhere within the Florescent Canal.

displayProperties.description: Locate a larvae incubator at the end of the Sepulcher Lost Sector in the Florescent Canal.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: You have what you need to begin revitalizing Savathûn's worm. In the meantime, Mara has located another incubator in the Sepulcher Lost Sector.

displayProperties.description: Gather leads by completing three patrols in the Florescent Canal.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: Fynch has pointed you in the general direction of another rune. Canvas the area and gather leads.

displayProperties.description: Locate a Cryptoglyph Rune in the Queen's Bailey.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: Fynch has transmitted details of a Cryptoglyph rune location. Track it down to re-energize the Cryptoglyph once more.

displayProperties.description: Find the entrance to the Metamorphosis Lost Sector in the Miasma.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: The Metamorphosis Lost Sector awaits you somewhere within the Miasma.

displayProperties.description: Locate a larvae incubator at the end of the Metamorphosis Lost Sector in Miasma.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: You have what you need to continue revitalizing Savathûn's worm. Mara has located another incubator, this time in the Metamorphosis Lost Sector.

displayProperties.description: Locate a Cryptoglyph rune in the Alluring Curtain.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: Fynch has transmitted details of a Cryptoglyph rune location. Track it down to re-energize the Cryptoglyph once more.

displayProperties.description: Find the nearby Deepsight cache in the Alluring Curtain.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: The rune was stolen and stashed away before you could get to it. Seek out the nearby Deepsight cache to retrieve it.

displayProperties.description: Find the entrance to the Extraction Lost Sector in Quagmire.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: The Extraction Lost Sector awaits you somewhere within Quagmire.

displayProperties.description: Locate a larvae incubator at the end of the Extraction Lost Sector in the Quagmire.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary:
Savathûn's dormant curse is now killing her worm! You'll need to act fast to keep it alive before you can start looking for Mara.

Fynch may have an answer…

displayProperties.description: Visit Fynch and see if he can help Savathûn's worm.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary:
Savathûn's dormant curse is now killing her worm! You'll need to act fast to keep it alive before you can start looking for Mara.

Fynch may have an answer…

displayProperties.description: Complete the "Parasitic Pilgrimage" mission.
displayProperties.name: Of Queens and Worms

setData.questLineDescription: Meet with Mara Sov in the Enclave on Mars.
setData.questStepSummary: The casing provided by Fynch may save Savathûn's worm, but you'll need to find a way to combine the two. Seek energy to sustain the worm in the meantime.

displayProperties.description: Complete a Wellspring activity.
displayProperties.name: The Spring of Power

setData.questStepSummary: With Savathûn gone, the Wellspring's up for grabs, and the Hive and Scorn are fighting over it. Its power can't fall into the wrong hands. That means you're up.

displayProperties.description: Uncover more Executioners each day to fill the Memory Alembic.
displayProperties.name: Memory Alembic

setData.questStepSummary: Savathûn's Executioners use the fluid Qualichor to access Deepsight and track their prey. If you concentrate enough of it in the Memory Alembic, you can uncover long-forgotten memories.

displayProperties.description: Return to Fynch to see what ancient memories are brewing.
displayProperties.name: Memory Alembic

setData.questStepSummary: The Alembic bubbles and churns. Degraded strands of experience within—a thrash of pain, the smell of tears on hot stone, a Thrall's first breath—tickle your Deepsight. The brew smells like defiance and last words.

displayProperties.description: Loot region chests.
displayProperties.name: Trust Goes Both Ways

setData.questStepSummary: Fynch has located Scorn stockpiles for you to capture.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Scorn and complete a public event in the Miasma.
displayProperties.name: Trust Goes Both Ways

setData.questStepSummary: Fynch has noticed more and more Scorn incursions across the Throne World. He asks that you deal with them where you can.

displayProperties.description: Loot Faction Chests and complete patrols in the Miasma.
displayProperties.name: Trust Goes Both Ways

setData.questStepSummary: Fynch thinks the Scorn are hurting, but they could stand to hurt a little more. That would help sell to his "superiors" that he and his Knight are out there doing their part. Give him a hand.

displayProperties.description: Earn enough reputation with Fynch to reach Rank 3.
displayProperties.name: Trust Goes Both Ways

setData.questStepSummary: Fynch is pleased with your efforts, but he hopes you've still got a little more fight left in you…

displayProperties.description: Return to Fynch.
displayProperties.name: Trust Goes Both Ways

setData.questStepSummary: Fynch feels like he can trust you now, and as a gesture of that trust, he has a token of appreciation to give you. Go visit him.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Scorn in the Miasma to obtain 10 Umbral Helmets.
displayProperties.name: The Gift of Appreciation

setData.questStepSummary: Fynch knows the Lucent Brood won't sit idle if Scorn come calling. He asks you to grab whatever you can from the Scorn and use it as bait to draw out the Hive.

displayProperties.description: Locate all region chests.
displayProperties.name: The Gift of Appreciation

setData.questStepSummary: Fynch knows the Hive you're attempting to draw out will put up a tough fight. He's located a few stockpiles around the Throne World to give you an advantage.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Lucent Brood and complete a public event in the Florescent Canal.
displayProperties.name: The Gift of Appreciation

setData.questStepSummary: Fynch thinks it's time to rile up the Hive Lightbearers. To that end, he asks you to get out there and take down Hive wherever you find them.

displayProperties.description: Within the Queen's Bailey, place the Umbral Helmets and defeat the Hive Lightbearers, then crush their Ghosts.
displayProperties.name: The Gift of Appreciation

setData.questStepSummary: Now that the Hive Lightbearers are sufficiently irked, it's time to use those Scorn Helmets to draw them out and defeat them.

displayProperties.description: Return to Fynch.
displayProperties.name: The Gift of Appreciation

setData.questStepSummary: Fynch is thrilled to keep playing a role in the fight against Savathûn. He has a little something to show you his appreciation. Pay him a visit.

displayProperties.description: Rumors swirl about an old friend returning to the Tower. Investigate what's happening.
displayProperties.name: Armor Synthesis Introduction

setData.questStepSummary: Banshee informed you that Ada-1 is back in the Tower and seeking Guardians' help for a new project. He suggested you speak with her.

displayProperties.description: Secure a foothold on Europa. Complete the quest "Darkness's Doorstep."
displayProperties.name: Armor Synthesis Introduction

setData.questStepSummary: Ada needs your help investigating an unfinished project in the Bray archives on Europa, but that won't be possible until you've secured a foothold on that location.

displayProperties.description: Travel to Europa and recover the research data from the BrayTech facilities.
displayProperties.name: Armor Synthesis Introduction

setData.questStepSummary: Ada has been working on a prototype matter programming device using schematics recovered from Europa, but some of the data can't be accessed remotely—she needs your help acquiring it.

displayProperties.description: Find the processing unit the schematics refer to.
displayProperties.name: Armor Synthesis Introduction

setData.questStepSummary: Ada has been working on a project using recovered schematics from Europa. In addition to data, she also needs help retrieving a physical component to complete the prototype.

displayProperties.description: Visit Ada-1 in the Tower to discuss your findings.
displayProperties.name: Armor Synthesis Introduction

setData.questStepSummary: You've recovered the data and processing unit from Europa. Once returned to Ada, she will have everything she needs to finish the prototype device.

displayProperties.description: Interact with the Loom to connect the processing unit and finish the device.
displayProperties.name: Armor Synthesis Introduction

setData.questStepSummary: Ada's matter programming device is ready for completion, and she's asked you to do the honors of connecting the processing unit.

displayProperties.description: Return to Ada-1 to learn about the finished Loom.
displayProperties.name: Armor Synthesis Introduction

setData.questStepSummary: Thanks to your aid, the Loom is now operational. Ada wants to speak one more time before testing the device's capabilities.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Ada-1 in the Tower to receive starter materials for Armor Synthesis.
displayProperties.name: Tying It All Together

setData.questStepSummary: Ada has completed the first test run of the Loom and wants to share the results with you.

displayProperties.description: Use the Synthweave that Ada provided to create an ornament from any piece of Legendary armor you've acquired.
displayProperties.name: Tying It All Together

setData.questStepSummary: Ada has supplied you with Synthweave from the Loom's first production run. She wants you to try making an ornament out of it to verify the product is functioning correctly.

displayProperties.description: Return to Ada-1 in the Tower to discuss your progress.
displayProperties.name: Tying It All Together

setData.questStepSummary: The initial Synthweave test was successful—now Ada wants to walk you through the full production process.

displayProperties.description: Purchase any Armor Synthesis bounty from Ada-1.
displayProperties.name: Tying It All Together

setData.questStepSummary: The initial Synthweave test was successful—now Ada wants to walk you through the full production process.

displayProperties.description: Complete any Armor Synthesis bounty and claim its reward.
displayProperties.name: Tying It All Together

setData.questStepSummary: The initial Synthweave test was successful—now Ada wants to walk you through the full production process.

displayProperties.description: Use the Loom to convert your Synthcord into Synthweave.
displayProperties.name: Tying It All Together

setData.questStepSummary: The initial Synthweave test was successful—now Ada wants to walk you through the full production process.

displayProperties.description: Return to Ada-1 in the Tower Armory and report your successful operation of the Loom.
displayProperties.name: Tying It All Together

setData.questStepSummary: With your first production run on the Loom complete, Ada wants to review the product and talk next steps.

displayProperties.description: Acquire 10,000 Glimmer in order to purchase another Armor Synthesis bounty from Ada-1.
displayProperties.name: Tying It All Together

setData.questStepSummary: With your first production run on the Loom complete, Ada is encouraged by the resulting product and the data she's gathered. She wants you to gather materials for a second run.

displayProperties.description: Return to Ada-1 to continue manufacturing Synthweave.
displayProperties.name: Tying It All Together

setData.questStepSummary: You've collected enough materials for a second production run on the Loom, and Ada wants to speak to you before testing the device again.

setData.questStepSummary: Deputy Commander Sloane spotted a Lucent Hive command ship entering Titan's atmosphere. Shortly after its arrival, the ship dove into the moon's methane sea and anomalous energy readings spiked at the New Pacific Arcology. The deputy commander has called on you to investigate.

setData.questLineDescription: Prevent the Lucent Hive from performing an unspeakable ritual deep in Titan's sea. Complete the dungeon "Ghosts of the Deep."

setData.questStepSummary: There's no spectacle like defending Neomuna from the Vex and Shadow Legion all at once. Complete Terminal Overload and loot the reward chest at the end.

displayProperties.description: Defeat the Vex Hydra in Esi Terminal to obtain a high-security passcode.
displayProperties.name: Stargazer

setData.questStepSummary: "Those secure caches the Vex leave behind? They're locked with paraquantum encryption, so you'll need a subroutine passcode ripped right out of a command unit." —Quinn

displayProperties.description: Obtain a Terminal Overload Key by completing public events, looting chests, or completing patrols.
displayProperties.name: Stargazer

setData.questStepSummary: "Whoa. This subroutine's huge! You'll need a security keycard to deliver it. They're scattered all over the place, and hard to find, so keep your eyes open." —Quinn

displayProperties.description: Use a key to open a Terminal Overload Key Chest.
displayProperties.name: Stargazer

setData.questStepSummary: With key in hand, the encrypted chest at the end of the Terminal Overload activity can be opened. Go forth to discover treasure and secrets.

displayProperties.description: Return to the Hall of Heroes to repair Stargazer's memorial.
displayProperties.name: Stargazer

setData.questStepSummary: A Stargazer's eyes marvel at new experiences. You can feel this Cloud Strider's legacy within the cosmic web.

displayProperties.description: Return to Quinn to discuss the next steps.
displayProperties.name: Stargazer

setData.questStepSummary:
"Hey, I've finished digging through the Stargazer archives you restored and I think I have our first real lead!"
—Quinn

displayProperties.description: Bond with Strand sources, and participate in public events, patrols, and loot resources, all within the Vex Incursion Zone.
displayProperties.name: Maelstrom

setData.questStepSummary:
"Maelstrom made her name pushing Vex out of the city. But she was strategic, too, always collecting resources and intelligence."
—Quinn

displayProperties.description: Complete the Lost Sector within the Vex Incursion Zone.
displayProperties.name: Maelstrom

setData.questStepSummary: A powerful commander has taken refuge nearby. Surely this is a test of any true warrior's mettle!

displayProperties.description: Return to the Hall of Heroes to repair Maelstrom's memorial.
displayProperties.name: Maelstrom

setData.questStepSummary: A Maelstrom overwhelms all that stands before it, leveling the proud and creating new opportunity in its wake. You can feel this Cloud Strider's legacy within the cosmic web.
